thread.title: Half Girlfriend FIRST LOOK: Arjun Kapoor & Shraddha Kapoor Indulge In Some Rain Soaked Romance!
thread.title_full: Half Girlfriend FIRST LOOK: Arjun Kapoor & Shraddha Kapoor Indulge In Some Rain Soaked Romance!

title: Half Girlfriend FIRST LOOK: Arjun Kapoor & Shraddha Kapoor Indulge In Some Rain Soaked Romance!
text:
Â» Half Girlfriend FIRST LOOK: Arjun Kapoor & Shraddha Kapoor Indulge In Some Rain Soaked Romance! Half Girlfriend FIRST LOOK: Arjun Kapoor & Shraddha Kapoor Indulge In Some Rain Soaked Romance! We bring you the first look of Arjun Kapoor- Shraddha Kapoor starrer Half Girlfriend to drab up your boring day! Published: Tuesday, March 28, 2017, 11:23 [IST] Subscribe to Filmibeat 
Here's something to make your Gudi Padwa even more happier! The makers of Arun Kapoor-Shraddha Kapoor starrer Half Girlfriend have unveiled the first official look of the film on this auspicious occassion. 
Here's all you need to know about this Mohit Suri directorial- 
First Look Of Half Girlfriend 
The first official look of the film is out and it shows the lead pair- Arjun Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor romancing in the rains. Did you guys like it? Based On Chetan Bhagat's Popular Novel 'Half Girlfriend' 
Mohit's film is the Bollywood adaptation of Chetan Bhagat's popular novel with the same name. The plot is the story of a Bihari boy in quest of winning over the girl he loves. The Basketball Connection 
The lead pair essay ace basketball players in the film and took training under the National Basketball Association to prep up for their role. Shraddha has shedded off her girl-next-door image and will be seen in a glamorous avatar. What's Common Between Half Girlfriend & Aashiqui 2? 
Didn't the poster take you back to the Aashqui 2 days? Looks like Mohit Suri loves rain-soaked romance! Half Girlfriend To Clash With Dobaara 
Arjun-Shraddha starrer Half Girlfriend will lock horns at the box office with Saqib Salem- Huma Qureshi's Dobaara on 19th May. The latter is a remake of Hollywood flick Oculus.
